title: Base API Endpoint
description: The base schema for defining API endpoints, including path, method, and request/response schemas.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

request_schema.description: A reference to the JSON schema for the request body or parameters.

response_schema.description: A reference to the JSON schema for the success response body.
